channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Missing. 30 MPH sign, 14th July
item.description:
On entering the B4063 Cheltenham Road East Missing 30 MPH sign does not make the TRO Legal. ? Therefore excess speed is commonplace With the much used cycleway in close proximity

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden park bench gone, 14th July
item.description:
A wooden bench which was old and in poor condition has now gone. Much used by dog walkers and elderly folk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Confusing road markings, 14th July
item.description:
The curved line here causes confusion at this crossroads, because drivers turning right onto Clarence Road (coming towards and across this point of view) believe they have priority over oncoming vehicles going straight on.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Georges Place, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Overgrown with nettles and brambles on bridge, 14th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
